title: Buy Shriram City Union Finance; target of Rs 2180: Motilal Oswal - Moneycontrol.com
content: Buy Shriram City Union Finance; target of Rs 2180: Motilal Oswal  Moneycontrol.com
description: Motilal Oswal is bullish on Shriram City Union Finance recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 2180 in its research report dated January 30, 2022.
